description: The event staff work together to take care of guests and maintain the safety and cleanliness of the event. There are numerous and varied positions, ideal for any experience level! Positions include assisting guests with getting into queue lines, scanning tickets, accessing attractions, taking photos, answering questions, and guiding guests around the property.
responsibilities: Ability to be on your feet for 5-6 hours, Patience, Ability to communicate verbally with guests, Ability to follow instructions
